models.name: fast
models.description: This uses the currently loaded model.

models.name: Pegasus
models.description: Pegasus is a model developed by Google. It is a transformer. The encoder is pretrained by masking tokens, the decoder is pretrained by masking whole sentences.

models.name: DistilBART
models.description: This is a BART-model. The decoder is distilled from 12 to 6 layers.

models.name: Dialogue-BART
models.description: This is a BART-model that was trained afterwards on a dialogue-dataset.
